name: battlecode-client
description: Client wrapper of visualizer and playback

scripts.install-all: (cd playback && npm install) && (cd visualizer && npm install)
scripts.build: (cd playback && npm run build) && (cd visualizer && npm run build)
scripts.electron: npm run build-playback && (cd visualizer && npm run electron)
scripts.watch: npm run build-playback && (cd visualizer && npm run watch)
scripts.prod-electron: npm run build-playback && (cd visualizer && npm run prod-electron)
scripts.prod-electron-no-sign: npm run build-playback && (cd visualizer && npm run prod-electron-no-sign)
scripts.prod-test: npm run build-playback && (cd visualizer && npm run prod-test)

author: Teh Devs
